page.title: 20DOMESDAY AUTHORS
page.content: Most of the work for the Domesday Project was done by ten of us.(in blue).This meant that it was easy for us to get out to see our twelve squares.We have learnt a lot more about map reading. Our biggest problem was feeling that we did not have enough time.Mrs. Springham wanted us to do everything but because the computer played up we have been delayed. We send best wishes to the children of 100 years from now -{2086AD.}Lanivet village will still be here but we wonder about the school. {Charlotte(9) Nina(9) Peter(10) {Ross(10) Kevin(10) Sarah(10) Wayne(10) {Alan(10) Kerrie(10) Claire(10) {The other 53 children contributed in {some way and so did the teachers. }
